name: getlaidgetajob
body:
# Get a job. Get laid. Covers all the bases, right?

## It's 2015. You need a LinkedIn portrait to get hired. You need a Grindr/Tinder/FarmersOnly.com pic to get a date. And that selfie you took in the mirror at a bar isn't going to cut it.

### So here's the simple deal. $50, you get a professional shot for your job hunt, and a less professional shot for your man hunt. In, out, you get your photos the same day, all rights released.

Want extra shots to pad out Tinder? $15 a pop. Want *just* a job pic or a dating pic? $35.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
